name: Soft Space
tag_list: mobile-payment, softspace, iphone-payment, soft-space, softspace-payment, soft-space-payment, chip--pin, chip--pin-mobile, accept-credit-card-over-iphone, iphone-credit-card, accept-card-payments-on-iphone, emv-card-payment-mobile, emv-card-payment-on-iph
overview:
Our mission is simple: make it a reality for anyone to accept card payments anywhere, anytime, securely.

We are a technology company pioneering in digital and electronic financial applications, products and services, to provide innovative purchasing and paying platforms for financial institutions, businesses and individuals, with focus on the utilization of EMV payment platform on smart devices.

At Soft Space, we produce exciting digital purchase environments while creating fast and easy payment methods through mobile gadgets, for the benefit of everyone.

As we strive to continuously generate tangible solutions for sales and services, we are pleased to share with our partners the future dining and shopping lifestyle, today.

video_embeds.description: Soft Space | Now Everyone Can Accept Card Payments
